fields.title: Implement a project-level admin permission
fields.body: There needs to be a way to specify project-level admin powers to allow permitted users to create repositories in a particular project.  The *EditRepositoryPage* would need to be updated to allow repo creation using a dropdown selector for the project.

comment.text:
Here is the plan of attack:

1. Move repository *ownership* from the RepositoryModel to the UserModel (painful)
2. Expand UserModel.isOwner() to include project paths
3. Give repository owners full admin powers over the repository (e.g. allow rename)
4. Consider allowing teams to be owners too
